members.name: TrackDefault()
members.description: Constructs and returns a new TrackDefault object.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: A DOMString specifying a media segment data type for the SourceBuffer to contain. Can be audio, video, or text.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: A DOMString specifying a default language for the SourceBuffer to use when an initialization segment does not contain language information for a new track.

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: A DOMString specifying a default label for the SourceBuffer to use when an initialization segment does not contain label information for a new track.

parameters.name: kinds
parameters.description: An array (sequence) of DOMStrings specifying default kinds for the SourceBuffer to use when an initialization segment does not contain kind information for a new track.

parameters.name: byteStreamTrackID Optional
parameters.description: A DOMString specifying the ID of the specific track that the SourceBuffer should apply to. If not specified, this value will be an empty string and the SourceBuffer can contain any tracks of the specified type.

members.name: TrackDefault.type
members.description: Returns the type of track that this SourceBuffer's media segment data relates to (i.e. audio, video, or text track.)

members.name: TrackDefault.byteStreamTrackID
members.description: Returns the ID of the specific track that the SourceBuffer should apply to.

members.name: TrackDefault.language
members.description: Returns the default language to use when an initialization segment does not contain language information for a new track.

members.name: TrackDefault.label
members.description: Returns the default label to use when an initialization segment does not contain label information for a new track.

members.name: TrackDefault.kinds
members.description: Returns the default kinds used when an initialization segment does not contain kind information for a new track.
